isis.stitle: POWER STEERING GEAR: SHEPPARD M-SERIES - Special Tools

sstools.para: Power Steering Analyzer - Comes complete with flared tube connectors and female swivel fitting hoses. The analyzer is designed for measuring power steering pump flow rate and pump pressure. The analyzer includes a one to ten gallon-per-minute flow rate and 0 to 3,000 pound range pressure gauge. It is supplied with two quick couplings on the analyzer's hoses for connecting to the hydraulic system. To install, disconnect high pressure line at either the power steering pump or steering gear and connect analyzer into the high pressure line. Includes storage case and instruction on how to use.

sstools.para: Spring Tension Scale (0-25 lbs.) - Used to measure pitman arm backlash, as well as pinion bearing preload.
